text: Check if two items are in a list, in a particular order?
Say I have a list v = [1, 2, 3, 4, 3, 1, 2].
I want to write a function, find_pair which will check if two numbers are in the list and adjacent to each other.
So, find_pair(v, 2, 3) should return True, but find_pair(v, 1, 4) should return False.
Is it possible to implement find_pair without a loop?
